duealert.MdsNoticeRemider: Your %%Schemename%% No: %%Accountnumber%% is due on %%duedt%% Total Due Rs. %%totaldue%% , Pls contact Bank for further proceedings..
duealert.MdsAuctionRemider: Your %%Schemename%% No: %%chittalNo%% is due on %%installmentDate%% Installment amount is. %%instamount%% and Installment no is :%%instNo%%
duealert.MdsReceiptRemider: Your %%Schemename%% No: %%chittalNo%% %%narration%% installment amount of %%instamount%% has been received
duealert.MdsPrizedRemider: Your %%Schemename%% No: %%chittalNo%% %%narration%% is prized with an amount of %%instamount%%
duealert.MdsInstallmentRemider: Your %%Schemename%% No: %%chittalNo%% ,Installment no :%%instNo%% is due on %%installmentDate%% Installment amount is. %%instamount%%.Please ignore if paid!!
duealert.LoanInstallmentRemider: Your %%Schemename%% No: %%chittalNo%% ,is due on %%installmentDate%% and due amount is. %%instamount%%.Please ignore if paid!!
duealert.WelcomeCustomer: Dear %%custName%% , Welcome to Ammadam SCB family. Thanks you for Choosing ASC Bank as your Favorite Banker.
duealert.appLoginPassword: Your mobile app login password is %%otpPin%%. Please use this password for login. Do not share this password with anyone.
duealert.appOTP: OTP %%otpPin%% for Beneficiary creation, Please use the OTP for completing the activity, Plz do not share this with anyone.
duealert.MaturedDepositRemider: Your Deposit number %%depositNo%% opened with Ammadam SCB is going to mature on %%maturityDate%%, Pls instruct bank for further proceedings.. Thanks for banking with us.
duealert.MaturedCustDepositRemider: Your Deposits number opened with ASCB is going to mature soon, Pls instruct bank for further proceedings.. Thanks for banking with us.
duealert.RdInstallmentReminder: Your Recurring Deposit ac num %%depositNo%% held with Ammadam SCB , The instalment will be due on %%installmentDate%%, Pls ignore if paid..
duealert.MultipleTOSingleCusomerWiseMsg: Your multiple deposits interest amount has been credited to your account
duealert.SingleTOSingleCusomerWiseMsg: Your deposits interest amount has been CREDITED to your Account
duealert.MultipleTOSingleCusomerWiseWithSBBalMsg: Your deposits interest amount of Rs %%intAmt%% has been CREDITED to your Account and Balance Rs %%OAbalance%%
duealert.MultipleTOSingleCusomerWiseRenewalMsg: Your renewal interest amount has been CREDITED to your Account
duealert.MultipleTOSingleCusomerWiseRenewalWithSB: Your renewal interest amount of Rs %%intAmt%% has been CREDITED to your Account and Balance Rs %%OAbalance%%
duealert.otpMessage: OTP for Mobile Banking is %%otpPin%% , Please use the password to compelete the activity.Plz dont share this with anyone.
